docs.snippet: “What is happening?” movie fans asked after the wrong Oscar winner was announced. Here’s a transcript of what happened onstage....
docs.lead_paragraph: “What is happening?” movie fans asked after the wrong Oscar winner was announced. Here’s a transcript of what happened onstage.

headline.main: A Transcript of the Best-Picture Mixup: It Was ‘La La Land,’ Until It Was ‘Moonlight’

docs.snippet: Silicon Valley crashed Hollywood's biggest awards show on Sunday as Amazon.com Inc and Netflix Inc collected the first Academy Awards for streaming services while independent studio A24 won the coveted best picture Oscar....

docs.snippet: Chinese company LeSports had its four-year contract to broadcast Asian Football Confederation (AFC) competitions terminated by the continental governing body last week after failing to pay an instalment on the deal, sources have confirmed to Reute...
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese company LeSports had its four-year contract to broadcast Asian Football Confederation (AFC) competitions terminated by the continental governing body last week after failing to pay an instalment on the deal, sources have confirmed to Reuters.

docs.snippet: "Moonlight," a drama about a gay black youth coming to terms with his sexuality in an impoverished Miami neighborhood, received the Oscar for best picture on Sunday after a stunning, unprecedented flub in which presenters erroneously announced the...
docs.lead_paragraph: "Moonlight," a drama about a gay black youth coming to terms with his sexuality in an impoverished Miami neighborhood, received the Oscar for best picture on Sunday after a stunning, unprecedented flub in which presenters erroneously announced the musical "La La Land" as the winner.

headline.main: 'Moonlight' Wins Award as Best Picture After Oscar Flub
headline.print_headline: 'Moonlight' Wins Award as Best Picture After Oscar Flub

docs.snippet: An accountant for the Academy Awards botched the meticulous procedure for announcing the Oscar for best picture when he handed victory to "La La Land" before declaring "Moonlight" the real winner, PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An accountant for the Academy Awards botched the meticulous procedure for announcing the Oscar for best picture when he handed victory to "La La Land" before declaring "Moonlight" the real winner, PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) said on Monday.

headline.main: Tweeting Accountant Blamed for Oscar Best Picture Blunder
headline.print_headline: Tweeting Accountant Blamed for Oscar Best Picture Blunder
